sentences.sContent: And I think what we're seeing in the economy now is the inherent resilience of the American economy and the American people.
sentences.sContent_eng: And I think what we're seeing in the economy now is the inherent resilience of the American economy and the American people.
sentences.sCn: 而且我认为，我认为，在经济方面，我们现在看到的是美国经济和美国人民一直以来所固有的弹性。

remMethod.val: 来自resilient(a. 有弹性的； 适应力强的)

trans.tranOther: the ability of a substance such as rubber to return to its original shape after it has been pressed or bent
